name: Spirits Never Die
description:
Work your dream job at the box factory. Push boxes onto switches, climb on boxes to get keys, squish people with and get squished by falling boxes. Fall to your death. Escape from your corporeal form and inhabit the flesh of another. 

  • 30+ grid based 2D block pushing puzzles
  • gravity!
  • lasers!
  • possession!
  • pixel art!

developer note: the development of this game is on hold.  Most of the levels were made in 2019 and 2020 after creating a prototype for Mini Jam called "The Red Spirit". I might resume work on Spirits Never Die in the future to add more levels and art  and maybe even a level editor.
